channel.title: Project Fire - 2006 Revolution
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac250/lukiuz/Untitled-1-1.jpg[/img][/center]
[img]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac250/lukiuz/boxListBullet.gif[/img][b] Introduction[/b] [i]Project Fire is a 317-based replica of RuneScape. The aim of this project is to revolutionize the casual gameplay that gamers currently experience while playing todays RSPS. 15x higher xp rates, every skill working, all quests and more!
[size=x-small]More information, progress and media coming soon![/size][/i]
[img]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac250/lukiuz/boxListBullet.gif[/img][b] Positions available[/b] [i]The minimum requirement to become a part of our team is at least 1+ year of experience in your field, basic+ java understanding, ability to cooperate, ability to stay mature, calm, not to rush in any situation, a microphone and skype/teamspeak/ventrillo/etc.
The positions currently available:[/i]
[ul][li]Client Coder: [i]1/2[/i][/li] [li]Server Coder: [i]FULL[/i][/li] [li]Website Designer+Programmer: [i]FULL[/i][/li] [li]Closed-Alpha testers: 7/50 - [b]APPLY WHILE YOU STILL CAN![/b][/li] [li]Supporters: 10/∞[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac250/lukiuz/boxListBullet.gif[/img][b] Regarding applications[/b] To apply, leave a reply with your application with the position you want to apply with, short bio and anything else you want to add or if you want to keep things private, send me a PM [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=544793]here[/url].

item.title: Project Fire - 2006 Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Lucas Mod Lucas
item.description:
@Mod_Lucas wrote:

Status Update #1
by Development Team

“We’re currently working on a completely new base for our future servers. This project uses
the old unorganized and crappy 317 source which we’re re-making into an organized & neat
one. This process might take some time, but in the end it will be worth it. Another neat thing
would be that we managed to get some of the formulas that RuneScape uses and most of them
aren’t used in any of the private servers in existence, so we can officially say that Project Fire
will be as close to realism as humanly possible - ahead of all the other server projects.”

Posted on: 9/2/11 9:00PM

Read full topic

item.title: Project Fire - 2006 Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Lucas Mod Lucas
item.description:
@Mod_Lucas wrote:

[quote=“lugmfr, post:44, topic:412160”]I’d like to apply for server development. I’ve always found myself interested in rs-remakes. I’ve released a few due to find myself growing tired of working alone
I’ve been messing around with Java for about 3 years now, I know my stuff fairly well. Test me if you’d like or simply view my posts and take a look at what I’ve released.
I take constructive criticism extremely well, you rarely find me arguing with another person on the internet. I find it stupid and pointless.
I have experience using dropbox, that’s what I hope you use. So we can all share/access files as we please.

You can contact me at: teh_service@live.com I hope to see you contacting me soon, I’d love to be a part of this project.[/quote]

Downloading msn so that I could speak to you trough it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Fire - 2006 Revolution
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

I’d like to apply for server development. I’ve always found myself interested in rs-remakes. I’ve released a few due to find myself growing tired of working alone
I’ve been messing around with Java for about 3 years now, I know my stuff fairly well. Test me if you’d like or simply view my posts and take a look at what I’ve released.
I take constructive criticism extremely well, you rarely find me arguing with another person on the internet. I find it stupid and pointless.
I have experience using dropbox, that’s what I hope you use. So we can all share/access files as we please.

You can contact me at: teh_service@live.com I hope to see you contacting me soon, I’d love to be a part of this project.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mod_Lucas Mod Lucas
item.description:
@Mod_Lucas wrote:

@desert added to supporters & alpha preview.

@lost started out at delta but decided to start off with PI today. Not sure how things are going to work out,
since when I left moparscape, delta was the latest server source ever and PI as much as it is a clean source,
is sorta new for me, but in few days I hope to get used with the code.

If you’re gonna name it project fire, it should in some way have a relation to fire. You don’t just call something another thing because it sounds cool.

item.title: Project Fire - 2006 Revolution
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Lucas Mod Lucas
item.description:
@Mod_Lucas wrote:

[quote=“we rushed god, post:21, topic:412160”]Sorry but, this doesn’t seem as much as a team as you asking for people to do the work for you and you take credit.
Notice: Server Coders 0/2
Client Coders 0/2

1st: you don’t need 5 ppl working on 1 server (including you)
2nd: I would post pictures of your progress[/quote]

I could manage with 1 person coding each a client or server and yes, I would help with both
client and server. Also, did I state I would credit myself at all? Listen, as much as you kids prefer
ripping a source, editing 1 shop and renaming it into something like 1337pwnage-scape-pk, then
saying 90% credit me 10% guy who made the source - that’s not gonna happen. I want to build
a source and a client with my team which would be the absolute best or at least as close to that
title as possible. Also, people in my team are getting a share of cash we’re going to earn. The project
is all about the gameplay experience. I planned making 10% cash for each of the coders(including me),
that’s a total of 50% and then the rest goes to the server hosting/etc. This would make sure that
everyone is equal(including me) unlike what you kids might think…

pot up pls:

Logo is Nice. <3

Thanks. I’ve spent quite some time designing it 8)

Edit:

The only thing I have a problem with is in this picture http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac250/lukiuz/Untitled-1-1.jpg You inquire that Mopar said your server was the absolute best. Which is false. I don't recall him ever saying that to anyone.

Then again, I can say that it wasn’t specifically “moparisthebest” who said it and blablabla - you get the point. Obviously I didn’t mean that moparisthebest said that.

Read full topic
